name: Shit! The Game?
description:
This is a very Simple game made on Godot for experimental purposes and this is supposed to be a hard game the current high score is 2 deaths for completing the entire game. I feel like the game wanted to say this "Can You Finish Me?"

play online At : https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/714237?updated=1531909120

.EXE  format is discontinued yet you can download it the latest version is available in .html to support every operating system
